title: Portfolio Website
description: This webpage, which is being developed using Astro framework and styled with Tailwindcss

title: Live Chat App
description: A live chat application developed using MERN stack with user accounts and authentication

title: Weather App
description: Web application where a user can enter a city and view the live weather details through weather api

title: Todo List
description: Simple Todo List mobile application created using React Native and Expo, written in Typescript and using SQLite for local data storage

title: Mobile Store
description: Mobile application store to sell pc components. Users can login, browse categories and add to cart

title: Quick Draw
description: Users can draw something based on a prompt and AI is used to interpret and make guesses on what the user is drawing

title: Blackjack
description: Users can play blackjack against a bot, with different options for different strategies to play against

title: Flappy Bird
description: Flappy bird clone built using Unity and scripted with C#

title: Web Store
description: Online store where users can login, browse, add to cart and purchase video games which are sent using phpmailer
